overview: Dina runs away with her teenage daughter Laura after her abusive husband Gion gets imprisoned. However, Gion is released from the prison due to the pandemic and Dina is panicking because not only she took Laura but also took Gionâ€™s valuable antique statue away. Raka, a mysterious man appears and makes things even more complicated.
tagline: Husband. Wife. Daughter. Stranger. Who do you trust?
title: Paranoia
